attributes.title: 2016 Volkswagen Tiguan 2.0 TDI Comfortline

attributes.description: A Super Fast Stunning Open Top Car That Brings You Immense Driving Pleasure. Our 2016 Model Is Presented In Mondstein Metallic With A Amaro Braun Individual Leather Interior And Carbon Fibre Interior Trim. This Vehicle Has A LOW MILEAGE Of Only 89 000 km And Retains A Full Service History. Features Include M Drivers Package, M Twin-Clutch Transmission With Drivelogic, Adaptive M Chassis, M Performance Pipes, High Beam Assistant, Lane Change Warning, Driving Assistant, Surround View, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera, Surround View, BMW Adapptive LED Headlights, Head Up Display, Comfort Access, Real Time Traffic Information, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Electric Memory Seats, Heated Seats, Neck Warmer, Satellite Navigation, Harmon Kardon Surround System, Bluetooth, USB And Auxiliary Input, Connected Drive Services, Air Conditioner, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint And 20 Inch Alloy Wheels. This Superb Vehicle Is Fully Specced And Modern. Come And View It Today. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
